verses.verse: There is therefore<WG686> now<WG3568> no<WG3762> condemnation<WG2631> to them<WG3588> which are in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus,<WG2424> who walk<WG4043> not<WG3361> after<WG2596> the flesh,<WG4561> but<WG235> after<WG2596> the Spirit.<WG4151>

For <WG1063> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> of the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> of life<WG2222> in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> hath made me free<WG1659> <WG3165> from<WG575> the<WG3588> law<WG3551> of sin<WG266> and<WG2532> death.<WG2288>

For <WG1063> what the<WG3588> law<WG3551> could not do,<WG102> in<WG1722> that<WG3739> it was weak<WG770> through<WG1223> the<WG3588> flesh,<WG4561> God<WG2316> sending<WG3992> his own<WG1438> Son<WG5207> in<WG1722> the likeness<WG3667> of sinful<WG266> flesh,<WG4561> and<WG2532> for<WG4012> sin,<WG266> condemned<WG2632> sin<WG266> in<WG1722> the<WG3588> flesh: <WG4561>

That <WG2443> the<WG3588> righteousness<WG1345> of the<WG3588> law<WG3551> might be fulfilled<WG4137> in<WG1722> us,<WG2254> who walk<WG4043> not<WG3361> after<WG2596> the flesh,<WG4561> but<WG235> after<WG2596> the Spirit.<WG4151>

For <WG1063> they that are<WG5607> after<WG2596> the flesh<WG4561> do mind<WG5426> the things<WG3588> of the<WG3588> flesh;<WG4561> but<WG1161> they<WG3588> that are after<WG2596> the Spirit<WG4151> the things<WG3588> of the<WG3588> Spirit.<WG4151>
For <WG1063> to be carnally<WG4561> minded<WG5427> is death;<WG2288> but<WG1161> to be spiritually<WG4151> minded<WG5427> is life<WG2222> and<WG2532> peace.<WG1515>

Because <WG1360> the<WG3588> carnal<WG4561> mind<WG5427> is enmity<WG2189> against<WG1519> God:<WG2316> for<WG1063> it is not subject<WG5293> <WG3756> to the<WG3588> law<WG3551> of God,<WG2316> neither<WG3761> indeed<WG1063> can<WG1410> be.
So <WG1161> then they that are<WG5607> in<WG1722> the flesh<WG4561> cannot<WG1410> <WG3756> please<WG700> God.<WG2316>

But <WG1161> ye<WG5210> are<WG2075> not<WG3756> in<WG1722> the flesh,<WG4561> but<WG235> in<WG1722> the Spirit,<WG4151> if so be that<WG1512> the Spirit<WG4151> of God<WG2316> dwell<WG3611> in<WG1722> you.<WG5213> Now<WG1161> if any man<WG1536> have<WG2192> not<WG3756> the Spirit<WG4151> of Christ,<WG5547> he<WG3778> is<WG2076> none<WG3756> of his.<WG848>

And <WG1161> if<WG1487> Christ<WG5547> be in<WG1722> you,<WG5213> the<WG3588> body<WG4983> is<WG3303> dead<WG3498> because<WG1223> of sin;<WG266> but<WG1161> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> is life<WG2222> because<WG1223> of righteousness.<WG1343>

But <WG1161> if<WG1487> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> of him that raised up<WG1453> Jesus<WG2424> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498> dwell<WG3611> in<WG1722> you,<WG5213> he that raised up<WG1453> Christ<WG5547> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498> shall also<WG2532> quicken<WG2227> your<WG5216> mortal<WG2349> bodies<WG4983> by<WG1223> his<WG848> Spirit<WG4151> that dwelleth<WG1774> in<WG1722> you.<WG5213>
Therefore, <WG686> <WG3767> brethren,<WG80> we are<WG2070> debtors,<WG3781> not<WG3756> to the<WG3588> flesh,<WG4561> to live<WG2198> after<WG2596> the<WG3588> flesh.<WG4561>

For <WG1063> if<WG1487> ye live<WG2198> after<WG2596> the flesh,<WG4561> ye shall<WG3195> die:<WG599> but<WG1161> if<WG1487> ye through the Spirit<WG4151> do mortify<WG2289> the<WG3588> deeds<WG4234> of the<WG3588> body,<WG4983> ye shall live.<WG2198>
For <WG1063> as many as<WG3745> are led<WG71> by the Spirit<WG4151> of God,<WG2316> they<WG3778> are<WG1526> the sons<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>

For <WG1063> ye have not<WG3756> received<WG2983> the spirit<WG4151> of bondage<WG1397> again<WG3825> to<WG1519> fear;<WG5401> but<WG235> ye have received<WG2983> the Spirit<WG4151> of adoption,<WG5206> whereby<WG1722> <WG3739> we cry,<WG2896> Abba,<WG5> Father.<WG3962>
The <WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> itself<WG846> beareth witness with<WG4828> our<WG2257> spirit,<WG4151> that<WG3754> we are<WG2070> the children<WG5043> of God: <WG2316>

And <WG1161> if<WG1487> children,<WG5043> then<WG2532> heirs;<WG2818> heirs<WG2818> of<WG3303> God,<WG2316> and<WG1161> joint-heirs<WG4789> with Christ;<WG5547> if so be that<WG1512> we suffer with<WG4841> him, that<WG2443> we may be also<WG2532> glorified together.<WG4888>

For <WG1063> I reckon<WG3049> that<WG3754> the<WG3588> sufferings<WG3804> of this present<WG3568> time<WG2540> are not<WG3756> worthy<WG514> to be compared with<WG4314> the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> which shall<WG3195> be revealed<WG601> in<WG1519> us.<WG2248>
For <WG1063> the<WG3588> earnest expectation<WG603> of the<WG3588> creature<WG2937> waiteth for<WG553> the<WG3588> manifestation<WG602> of the<WG3588> sons<WG5207> of God.<WG2316>

For <WG1063> the<WG3588> creature<WG2937> was made subject<WG5293> to vanity,<WG3153> not<WG3756> willingly,<WG1635> but<WG235> by reason of<WG1223> him who hath subjected<WG5293> the same in<WG1909> hope,<WG1680>

Because <WG3754> the<WG3588> creature<WG2937> itself<WG848> also<WG2532> shall be delivered<WG1659> from<WG575> the<WG3588> bondage<WG1397> of corruption<WG5356> into<WG1519> the<WG3588> glorious<WG1391> liberty<WG1657> of the<WG3588> children<WG5043> of God.<WG2316>
For <WG1063> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> the whole<WG3956> creation<WG2937> groaneth<WG4959> and<WG2532> travaileth in pain together<WG4944> until<WG891> now.<WG3568>

And <WG1161> not<WG3756> only<WG3440> they, but<WG235> ourselves<WG848> also,<WG2532> which have<WG2192> the<WG3588> firstfruits<WG536> of the<WG3588> Spirit,<WG4151> even<WG2532> we<WG2249> ourselves<WG848> groan<WG4727> within<WG1722> ourselves,<WG1438> waiting for<WG553> the adoption,<WG5206> to wit, the<WG3588> redemption<WG629> of our<WG2257> body.<WG4983>

For <WG1063> we are saved<WG4982> by hope:<WG1680> but<WG1161> hope<WG1680> that is seen<WG991> is<WG2076> not<WG3756> hope:<WG1680> for<WG1063> what<WG3739> a man<WG5100> seeth,<WG991> why<WG5101> doth he yet<WG2532> hope for?<WG1679>
But <WG1161> if<WG1487> we hope for<WG1679> that<WG3739> we see<WG991> not,<WG3756> then do we with<WG1223> patience<WG5281> wait for<WG553> it.

<WG1161> Likewise<WG5615> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> also<WG2532> helpeth<WG4878> our<WG2257> infirmities:<WG769> for<WG1063> we know<WG1492> not<WG3756> what<WG5101> we should pray for<WG4336> as<WG2526> we ought:<WG1163> but<WG235> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> itself<WG848> maketh intercession<WG5241> for<WG5228> us<WG2257> with groanings<WG4726> which cannot be uttered.<WG215>

And <WG1161> he that searcheth<WG2045> the<WG3588> hearts<WG2588> knoweth<WG1492> what<WG5101> is the<WG3588> mind<WG5427> of the<WG3588> Spirit,<WG4151> because<WG3754> he maketh intercession<WG1793> for<WG5228> the saints<WG40> according<WG2596> to the will of God.<WG2316>

And <WG1161> we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> all things<WG3956> work together<WG4903> for<WG1519> good<WG18> to them that love<WG25> God,<WG2316> to them who are<WG5607> the<WG3588> called<WG2822> according<WG2596> to his purpose.<WG4286>

For <WG3754> whom<WG3739> he did foreknow,<WG4267> he also<WG2532> did predestinate<WG4309> to be conformed to<WG4832> the<WG3588> image<WG1504> of his<WG848> Son,<WG5207> that he<WG846> might be<WG1511> the firstborn<WG4416> among<WG1722> many<WG4183> brethren.<WG80>

Moreover <WG1161> whom<WG3739> he did predestinate,<WG4309> them<WG5128> he also<WG2532> called:<WG2564> and<WG2532> whom<WG3739> he called,<WG2564> them<WG5128> he also<WG2532> justified:<WG1344> and<WG1161> whom<WG3739> he justified,<WG1344> them<WG5128> he also<WG2532> glorified.<WG1392>
What <WG5101> shall we then<WG3767> say<WG2046> to<WG4314> these<WG5023> things? If<WG1487> God<WG2316> be for<WG5228> us,<WG2257> who<WG5101> can be against<WG2596> us?<WG2257>

He that<WG3739> <WG1065> spared<WG5339> not<WG3756> his own<WG2398> Son,<WG5207> but<WG235> delivered him up<WG3860> <WG846> for<WG5228> us<WG2257> all,<WG3956> how<WG4459> shall he not<WG3780> with<WG4862> him<WG846> also<WG2532> freely give<WG5483> us<WG2254> all things?<WG3956>
Who <WG5101> shall lay any thing to the charge<WG1458> <WG2596> of God's<WG2316> elect?<WG1588> It is God<WG2316> that justifieth.<WG1344>

Who <WG5101> is he that condemneth?<WG2632> It is Christ<WG5547> that died,<WG599> yea<WG1161> rather,<WG3123> that<WG2532> is risen again,<WG1453> who<WG3739> is<WG2076> even<WG2532> at<WG1722> the right hand<WG1188> of God,<WG2316> who<WG3739> also<WG2532> maketh intercession<WG1793> for<WG5228> us.<WG2257>

Who <WG5101> shall separate<WG5563> us<WG2248> from<WG575> the<WG3588> love<WG26> of Christ?<WG5547> shall tribulation,<WG2347> or<WG2228> distress,<WG4730> or<WG2228> persecution,<WG1375> or<WG2228> famine,<WG3042> or<WG2228> nakedness,<WG1132> or<WG2228> peril,<WG2794> or<WG2228> sword?<WG3162>

As <WG2531> it is written,<WG1125> For thy sake<WG1752> <WG4675> we are killed<WG2289> all<WG3650> the<WG3588> day<WG2250> long; we are accounted<WG3049> as<WG5613> sheep<WG4263> for the slaughter.<WG4967>
Nay, <WG235> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> these things<WG5125> we are more than conquerors<WG5245> through<WG1223> him that loved<WG25> us.<WG2248>

For <WG1063> I am persuaded,<WG3982> that<WG3754> neither<WG3777> death,<WG2288> nor<WG3777> life,<WG2222> nor<WG3777> angels,<WG32> nor<WG3777> principalities,<WG746> nor<WG3777> powers,<WG1411> nor<WG3777> things present,<WG1764> nor<WG3777> things to come,<WG3195>

Nor <WG3777> height,<WG5313> nor<WG3777> depth,<WG899> nor<WG3777> any<WG5100> other<WG2087> creature,<WG2937> shall be able<WG1410> to separate<WG5563> us<WG2248> from<WG575> the<WG3588> love<WG26> of God,<WG2316> which<WG3588> is in<WG1722> Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> our<WG2257> Lord.<WG2962>
